title: Bug 134949: Themes nest in other library
description: Bug 134949: Themes nest in other library Details: Themes nest in other library Step: 1.
OB: When navigating through the themes in the library, it is observed that themes are nesting within other libraries.
EB: Themes should not nest within other libraries. Each theme should be displayed independently without being contained within another library.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software and navigate to the library section.
2. Select a theme and observe if it nests within another library.
